system_summary: This Python-based system is designed to intelligently push data or notifications to an external service, complemented by a command-line utility for analyzing repository information.

components.label: Smart Push Worker
components.role: Orchestrates and executes intelligent data or notification pushing operations to a designated external service.

components.label: Repository Artist CLI
components.role: Provides command-line interface utilities for analyzing or visualizing aspects of a code repository.

components.label: External Push Target
components.role: Represents the external system or API endpoint that receives data or notifications from the Smart Push Worker.
